title: AI-driven sustainable development begins in Maharashtra's energy sector: CM Fadnavis
description: Maharashtra is pioneering an AI-driven 'Digital Twin' model for renewable energy distribution, a first for India. In collaboration with international partners, MahaVitaran aims to boost customer service, operational efficiency, and financial stability. This i…
content: Maharashtra is set to strengthen its power distribution network through a 'Digital Twin' model for solar and other renewable energy sources with MahaVitaran set to implement an AI-based digitisation … [+2243 chars]
